meanings.definition: A local anesthetic commonly used in over-the-counter products for pain relief.
meanings.sent1: The benzocaines in the cream helped numb the pain in my sore muscles.
meanings.sent2: I bought a spray with benzocaines to relieve the ache in my back.
meanings.sent3: The benzocaines in the gel made my skin feel like a sleepy blanket.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was so soothing, it was like benzocaines for my ears.
meanings.sent5: The benzocaines worked like magic, making the discomfort vanish instantly.
